params.amount: The amount of native tokens to burn (in wei)
params.from: The address to burn tokens from

returns.success: True if the burn was successful

returns.isAdmin: True if the address is an admin

params.amount: The amount of native tokens to mint (in wei)
params.recipient: The address that will receive the minted native tokens

returns.success: True if the mint was successful

burn(address,uint256).notice: Burns native tokens from a specific address

isAdmin(address).notice: Checks if an address has admin privileges

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints native tokens to a recipient address
